Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ewing/99th
ShortDescription: Southbound 30 South buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Avenue L, Indianapolis,  and Ewing  due to, street blockage near Ewing/99th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #30 South buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Avenue L, Indianapolis,  and Ewing  due to, street blockage near Ewing/99th

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
